tinfour.voronoi

Class LimitedVoronoi

  • java.lang.Object
    • tinfour.voronoi.LimitedVoronoi

  • public class LimitedVoronoi
extends java.lang.Object
    Constructs a Voronoi Diagram structure from a populated instance of an IncrementalTin. The resulting structure is "limited" in the sense that it covers only a finite domain on the coordinate plane (unlike a true Voronoi Diagram, which covers an infinite domain).

    This class is under development and is subject to changes in its API and behavior.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LimitedVoronoi(IIncrementalTin delaunayTriangulation)
      Constructs an instance of a Voronoi Diagram that corresponds to the input Delaunay Triangulation.

      Gets the bounds of the limited Voronoi Diagram.
      java.util.List<IQuadEdge> getEdges()
      Gets a list of the edges in the Voronoi Diagram
      java.util.List<ThiessenPolygon> getPolygons()
      Gets a list of the polygons that comprise the Voronoi Diagram
      IIncrementalTin getTin()
      Gets the instance of IIncrementalTin that was used to create this Voronoi Diagram object.
      java.util.List<Vertex> getVoronoiVertices()
      Gets the vertices that were created to produce the Voronoi Diagram.
      void printDiagnostics(java.io.PrintStream ps)
      Prints diagnostic statistics for the Voronoi Diagram object.

      • getBounds

        public java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D getBounds()
        Gets the bounds of the limited Voronoi Diagram. If there are "skinny" triangles along the perimeter, the bounds may be substantially larger than those of the original TIN.
        Returns:
        a valid rectangle

      • getEdges

        public java.util.List<IQuadEdge> getEdges()
        Gets a list of the edges in the Voronoi Diagram
        Returns:
        a valid list

      • getVoronoiVertices

        public java.util.List<Vertex> getVoronoiVertices()
        Gets the vertices that were created to produce the Voronoi Diagram. The output does not include the original vertices from the TIN.
        Returns:
        a valid list of vertices

      • getPolygons

        public java.util.List<ThiessenPolygon> getPolygons()
        Gets a list of the polygons that comprise the Voronoi Diagram
        Returns:
        a valid list of polygons

      • getTin

        public IIncrementalTin getTin()
        Gets the instance of IIncrementalTin that was used to create this Voronoi Diagram object.
        Returns:
        a valid IIncrementalTin instance.
